bug.author: alancast
bug.summary: V2 Preview-1 OSX "Refresh Application" doesn't work AB#17058
bug.description:
Describe the bug In version 2.0.0-preview1 OSX, when clicking on the "Refresh Application" button in settings the app just goes to a blank white screen To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Open VoTT (I have no connections created and no local projects, it was my first time installing VoTT) Click on the settings gear in the lower left corner Click the "Refresh Application" button on the right hand side
Expected behavior Unclear, but I was anticipating going back to the home screen or something with no projects there

Platform [ ] Electron [ ] Browser Neither, v2 is React OS [ ] Windows [x ] Mac [ ] Linux Additional context I don't have any projects setup yet, so this perhaps might not happen if projects are setup.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/alancast>@alancast</denchmark-link> - This is a bug. The application should refresh the current window.
